title: Bronze full helm

properties.value: The bronze full helmet is the weakest full helmet in RuneScape. The bronze full helmet grants greater defensive bonuses than its medium helmet counterpart, though at a cost of offensive bonuses for Ranged and Magic. There are no Defence requirements for wearing this helmet.

Item ID1155

The bronze full helmet is the weakest full helmet in RuneScape. The bronze full helmet grants greater defensive bonuses than its medium helmet counterpart, though at a cost of offensive bonuses for Ranged and Magic. There are no Defence requirements for wearing this helmet.

To create a bronze full helmet the player needs at least 7 Smithing, a hammer and two bronze bars. To make a helmet use one of the bars on an anvil with the hammer in the inventory. This grants 25 Smithing experience.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+4+5+3-1+4
 Other bonusesSlot

[[File:Bronze full helm detail.png|left|130x200px]]
[[File:Bronze full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''bronze full helmet''' is the weakest [[full helmet]] in [[RuneScape]]. The bronze full helmet grants greater defensive bonuses than its [[Bronze medium helmet|medium helmet counterpart]], though at a cost of offensive bonuses for [[Ranged]] and [[Magic]]. There are no [[Defence]] requirements for wearing this helmet.

To create a bronze full helmet the player needs at least 7 Smithing, a [[hammer]] and two [[bronze bar]]s. To make a helmet use one of the bars on an [[anvil]] with the hammer in the inventory. This grants 25 Smithing experience.
